name: Battery Collector (MrRamm)
description:
This is a prototype of a RC toy tank game. 

CONTROLS

WSAD to move
Space to jump
E to pick up the tank controller, press E again to drop it
R to flip the tank while you are controlling it
Hold right click to place boards, release to confirm placement
Cancel board placement by left clicking
Escape to open pause menu

OBJECTIVE

There are batteries scattered around the room. Plan a path and collect them as fast as possible! After you complete the level, you can press space to play again.
There are time clocks hidden around the level that you can collect to lower your overall time!
